description: This file defines API routes for managing 'projects' in a web application using FastAPI. It includes CRUD operations such as creating, listing, retrieving, updating, and deleting projects, with each route handling specific project-related HTTP requests. The code interacts with a backend database via a Supabase client, and it incorporates authentication to ensure only authorized users can access or modify projects.

classes.name: Project
classes.description: Schema model representing a project, used for response serialization.

classes.name: ProjectCreate
classes.description: Schema model for creating a new project, defines required fields.

classes.name: ProjectUpdate
classes.description: Schema model for updating an existing project, supports optional fields.

methods.name: create_project( project_data: ProjectCreate, credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Depends(security) )
methods.description: Creates a new project for the authenticated user with provided data.

methods.name: list_projects(credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Depends(security))
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all projects owned by the current user.

methods.name: get_project( project_id: str, credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Depends(security) )
methods.description: Retrieves a specific project by ID, ensuring user ownership.

methods.name: update_project( project_id: str, project_update: ProjectUpdate, credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Depends(security) )
methods.description: Updates fields of a specific project if the user is the owner.

methods.name: delete_project( project_id: str, credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Depends(security) )
methods.description: Deletes a specific project if the user is the owner.

ctags.name: update_project
ctags.signature: ( project_id: str, project_update: ProjectUpdate, credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Depends(security) )
